name: Ankaa
description:
WELCOME

in the world of ANKAA , where a blue phoenix is on a quest to regain his memory 
while exploring a fantasy world full of the uknown

 
CONTROLS:- A and D to move left and right 

-F to go to Fly mode And R to go to walk mode (u can't jump in walk mode)

-space to jump

Credits : thanks so muchh for my gf for deisgning the phoenixes , and for @Kimberly#0975(aka BlueGamesStudio)  for doing the enemy art and handling the animations (a lovely person and a talented one for sure)
